name: MathAdventurer
0:
”Alexa open Math Adventurer”
”Alexa ask Math Adventurer to start a new game”
”Alexa ask Math Adventurer how to play”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: math adventurer
des: In Math Adventurer, players go on adventures that help hone their math skills along the way. In order to advance through the game, you'll have to successfully answer addition problem. To defeat the dragon, you must enter its lair and explore the 10 rooms in the lair. Each room is locked and will need 1, 2, or 3 keys to open it. To get the keys to open the doors, you must unlock magical treasure chests that can only be opened by solving math problems.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
